title: The Poro King comes to the LCS

replies.body: Sounds like something fun to watch
Will we be graced with another Sextuple cast?

Why never any european players, why are all the fun matches like URF and this only the NA players. Seriously, it's not hard to see which region you focus the most on, with 2 worlds and all the ''for fun'' matches in NA, while we got the first worlds (none new about the game), a sucky All-Star (everyone wants the old format back) and no fun matches except ''EU casters takeover''.... .__.
